duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting individuals with developmental disability, mental health diagnoses, and behavioral issues in a residential setting.
Providing support and encouragement towards gaining life skills and working towards outcomes/goals.
Meal planning/preparation and facilitation of community activities.
Assisting with personal and medical care, behavior management, and medication administration.
Filling morning, evening, and overnight shifts 7 days a week.
Flexible scheduling to accommodate individual needs.
